name: Platypus Platy Bottle
description: Much lighter than a hard-sided bottle (about 80% lighter), this 2L collapsible container is great size for places where water sources are scarce or hard to locate.Free-standing design stands upright and is stable.Food-grade liner keeps water taste-free.Threaded cap is compatible with all Platy lids and drinking tubes.Dimensions are 19 x 35cm.
